title: Sensei

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You may grant yourself Basic Defense at night; Additionally, if you are attacked when you do this, you will deal a Basic Attack back to the attacker (Unless the attacker's visit is Astral).
- At night, you may visit a player. They will gain one of these abilities based on how many times you have already visited them during this game:
• 0 prior visits: You may grant yourself Basic Defense at night.
• 1 prior visit: You may grant yourself Basic Defense at night; Additionally, if you are attacked when you do this, you will deal a Basic Attack back to the attacker (Unless the attacker's visit is Astral).
• 2 prior visits: You may use any of the Sensei (Post 871)'s night abilities.

desc:
Post 871
*To learn its ways, you must first learn the ways of your own soul. Let us meditate upon this wisdom now.*
